suncertify.client
Class GUIController

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.client.GUIController
public class GUIController
extends java.lang.Object

This class forms the controller between the data store (the model) and the client window (the view).

Version:
1.0
Author:
Gregory Biegel

                          throws java.io.IOException

book

public boolean book(int id,
                    long customerID)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    RecordNotFoundException,
                    java.lang.SecurityException
Books a specific contractor in the database.

Parameters:
id - the identifier of the contractor to book.
customerID - the CSR against which to book the booking.
Returns:
whether the booking was successful.
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - thrown if the record is not found
java.lang.SecurityException - thrown if record is locked by another user
java.io.IOException - thrown if there is a problem accessing the database file
